GK16viprud_u:5322: dvāraṃ yānti vilokayanti purato niḥ śvāsamātanvate
GK16viprud_u:5323: śuṣyanti pralapanti yānti tanutāṃ muhyanti mūrcchanti ca // ViPrud_8.245 //
GK16viprud_u:5328: kampaṃ bhrāmyati sarvataḥ prativanaṃ pratyarthibhūbhṛdgaṇaḥ // ViPrud_8.246 //
GK16viprud_u:5331: kāraṇānāṃ samudyogaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ // ViPrud_8.247 //
GK16viprud_u:5337: śubhraṃ yaśaḥ śauryamahacca vṛttaṃ vidyānavadyā vimalaṃ kulaṃ ca /
GK16viprud_u:5339: atra yaśaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ lokottararītisaṃpādane pratyekaṃ hetutve 'pi yugapatkhalekapotanyāyena saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5344: yatraikasmin kāraṇe kāryasādhanāya pravṛtte kākatālīyatayānyat kāraṇamāgatya tatkāryaṃ sukaraṃ karoti sa samādhyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5346: vaktreṣu yadvāyuvaśāt patanti tṛṇāni devasya sa pakṣapātaḥ // ViPrud_8.250 //
GK16viprud_u:5347: atra pratāparudranarendrakrodhaśāntyarthaṃ raṇāgre prakrāntastutīnāṃ rājñāṃ vaktreṣu vāyuvaśāt kākatālīyatayā patitaistṛṇaiḥ kopaśāntilakṣaṇakāryasya sukaratvam /
GK16viprud_u:5352: yatrādbhutacaritopavarṇanād bhūtabhāvinorvastunoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ bhavati sa bhāvikālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5371: atrāṣṭādaśadvīpayuktāyā medinyā daṃṣṭrāgre mṛdbindurūpateti atyadbhutavarṇanayā tathāvidhabhāvanāyāṃ pratyakṣavat pratītisaṃbhavaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5376: yatra prabalasya pratipakṣasya pratīkārāsāmarthyāt tadīyatiraskāro bhavati tat pratyanīkam / yathā---
GK16viprud_u:5382: yena yat sādhitaṃ vastu tenaiva kriyate 'nyathā /
GK16viprud_u:5383: anyena tadalaṃkāro vyāghātā iti kathyate // ViPrud_8.255 //
GK16viprud_u:5384: yadvastu yena kenacit kartrā yena sādhanena sādhitaṃ,
GK16viprud_u:5385: tadvastu tenaiva sādhanenānyena kartrā yadanyathā kriyate sa vyāghātaḥ / yathā---
GK16viprud_u:5392: yatra kramādekamādheyamanekasminnādhāre vartate sa ekaḥ paryāyaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5418: atra kastūrīvilepanena timirasamayaḥ saṃketakāla iti prakāśitam
GK16viprud_u:5422: tadudāttaṃ bhaved yatra samṛddhaṃ vastu varṇyate // ViPrud_8.262 //
GK16viprud_u:5439: ato labhante kavayaḥ sahasraṃ gandhasindhurān // ViPrud_8.265 //
GK16viprud_u:5447: dattvā bhūṣāṃ kirātebhyo labhante valkalādikam // ViPrud_8.267 // atra
GK16viprud_u:5453: yadā pūrvapūrvaṃ krameṇottarottaraṃ prati hetutāṃ bhajate,
GK16viprud_u:5458: yatrottarottareṣāṃ syāt pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kramāt /
GK16viprud_u:5460: yatra pūrvapūrvaṃ prati krameṇottarottaraṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhajate,
GK16viprud_u:5467: na tadrājyaṃ prajā yatra na bhavantyūrjitaśriyaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5468: na tāḥ prajāḥ prabhuryāsāṃ na svayaṃ kākatīśvaraḥ // ViPrud_8.272 //
GK16viprud_u:5486: yathā laukikānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ hiraṇmayānāṃ maṇimayānāṃ ca pṛthak saundaryahetūnāmanyonyasaṃbandhena cārutvātiśayo dṛśyate ;
GK16viprud_u:5487: tathaiva kāvyālaṅkārāṇāṃ rūpakādīnāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandhena saundaryātiśayaḥ pratīyate /
GK16viprud_u:5502: yatra tilataṇḍulanyāyena parasparasaṃbaddhā rūpakādayo bhavanti sā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5523: yatra kṣīranīranyāyenālaṅkārāṇāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandho bhavati sa saṅkaraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5530: atra yātrāḥ prāvṛḍvihārā ivetyupamālaṅkāreṇa dvipaghaṭākādambinītyatropamā prasādhyata iti sajātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ ;
GK16viprud_u:5536: prakṣālanāyeva kṛtasya dhātrā tadvartino durlipikalmaṣasya // ViPrud_9.7 //
GK16viprud_u:5537: atra prakṣālanāyevetyutprekṣayā durlipikalmaṣasyetyatra rūpakaṃ prasādhyata iti vijātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5549: na cātra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā pramāṇamanyatarasyāstīti saṃdeha eva paryavasyati /
GK16viprud_u:5554: atra kīrttaya eva mañjarya iti rūpakālaṅkāre vataṃsayantīti sādhakaṃ pramāṇam/
GK16viprud_u:5559: atra pratipakṣabalārṇava ityupamāyā vyākulīkṛtasattva iti bādhakaṃ pramāṇam ;
GK16viprud_u:5563: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamanyeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau boddhavyau tatra tatra prabandheṣu //
